rows.label: qst100411_msg0001
rows.name:
So-Solala!
Falala cannot believe it!
You alive!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0002
rows.name: ...You are Mrs. Falala?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0003
rows.name:
Solala is not your sonnypon.
He is Nopon from Kingdom of Invidia.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0004
rows.name:
What you saying? You are Falala's
beloved sonnypon Solala!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0005
rows.name:
Memories of Solala all gone?
Washed away by Cloud Sea?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0006
rows.name:
How?
How can Falala make you remember?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0101
rows.name: What would help him remember?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0102
rows.name: Hearing her sing

rows.label: qst100411_msg0103
rows.name: Eating her food

rows.label: qst100411_msg0110
rows.name:
Solala remember being sung to...
When he was littlepon...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0111
rows.name:
Falala would sing to littlepon
Solala. Maybe if Falala sings now...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0112
rows.name:
La la la ♪ La la la ♪
Ooh la la la la ♪

rows.label: qst100411_msg0113
rows.name: ...Do you remember?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0114
rows.name:
...No...
Song from Solala's memory was...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0115
rows.name:
Much more off-key!
You are not Solala's mamapon!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0116
rows.name:
Meh meh meh?!
What is Solala saying? Falala
became good singer for nothing?!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0117
rows.name:
In that case, maybe you remember
Falala's special cooking...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0130
rows.name:
You always ate Falala's
Spicy Stralu when you
were littlepon!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0131
rows.name: Here is some Falala made just now!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0132
rows.name:
*munch*
*gulp*

rows.label: qst100411_msg0133
rows.name: ...Do you remember?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0134
rows.name: Th-this taste...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0135
rows.name:
Is too delicious!
Cooking of Solala's mamapon
was a lot more dubious-tasting!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0136
rows.name:
Meh meh meh?!
Falala did too much
cooking and got too good!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0137
rows.name:
In that case, maybe you remember
song Falala sang to you as littlepon.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0201
rows.name:
*sob* *sob*
Song did not work. Cooking did not
work. What can Falala do?

rows.label: qst100411_msg0202
rows.name:
Solala is red-blooded Nopon
from Kingdom of Invidia!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0203
rows.name:
Not greedy stingy Nopon
from Avaritia!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0204
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]And Solala's mamapon not
this good singing, talented
foodymaker Nopon!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0205
rows.name:
Meh...
Meh meh...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0206
rows.name:
Falala tried so hard
to become good singer.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0207
rows.name:
Falala gathered ingredients
to make Spicy Stralu.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0208
rows.name:
Falala listened out for any
clue of Solala's whereabouts.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0209
rows.name:
Solala not care about all that.
Have nothing to do with Solala.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0210
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Grrrr!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0211
rows.name: Meh meh meh.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0212
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]This Solala is bad Nopon!
Must not be Falala's sonnypon after all!
Grrrrrraaaaghh!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0213
rows.name: Th-that blow...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0214
rows.name:
Look powerful, but
done with paw pads
so not really hurt...

rows.label: qst100411_msg0215
rows.name:
Ma...ma...
MAMAPON!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0216
rows.name:
You remember?!
Ahh! Solala!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0217
rows.name:
Solala remember!
So sorry, Mamapon!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0218
rows.name:
Solala went fishing in Cloud Sea
and fell in! Then drifted very far...
Mamapon, it was so scary!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0219
rows.name:
It OK now, sonnypon.
Mamapon is here!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0220
rows.name: Proper moved, I am!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0221
rows.name:
*sniff*
There's something in my eyes.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0222
rows.name:
Let's have ourselves a wee celebration!
Bring out the Spicy Stralu!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0223
rows.name: Sing for us, Falala!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0224
rows.name:
Yeah!
Great idea!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0225
rows.name: Thank you, friends!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0226
rows.name: Thanks to you, Solala came home.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0227
rows.name:
Falala does not have words
to express gratitude!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0228
rows.name: Falala is sorry for all the requests.

rows.label: qst100411_msg0229
rows.name:
Please stop by to enjoy
song and food any time!

rows.label: qst100411_msg0230
rows.name:
Special price for friends
who helped me out!
